verses.text: And in the \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w dreamed|strong="H2492"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*, wherewith his \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* was \w troubled|strong="H6470"\w*, and his \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* \w brake|strong="H1961"\w* from him.

Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* to \w call|strong="H7121"\w* the \w magicians|strong="H2748"\w*, and the \w astrologers|strong="H0825"\w*, and the \w sorcerers|strong="H3784"\w*, and the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, for to \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* his \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*. So they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, I have \w dreamed|strong="H2492"\w* a \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, and my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* was \w troubled|strong="H6470"\w* to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*.

Then \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in \w Syriack|strong="H0762"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w live|strong="H2418"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*: \w tell|strong="H0560"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, and we will \w shew|strong="H2324"\w* the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.\f + \fr 2.4 \ft O king…: (Chaldee, to the end of chapter seven)\f*

The \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* to the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3779"\w*, The \w thing|strong="H4406"\w* is \w gone|strong="H0230"\w* from \w me|strong="H4481"\w*: \w if|strong="H2006"\w* ye will \w not|strong="H3809"\w* make \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto me the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, with the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof, ye shall be \w cut|strong="H5648"\w* in \w pieces|strong="H1917"\w*, and your \w houses|strong="H1005"\w* shall be \w made|strong="H7761"\w* a \w dunghill|strong="H5122"\w*.\f + \fr 2.5 \ft cut…: Chaldee, made pieces\f*

But \w if|strong="H2006"\w* ye \w shew|strong="H2324"\w* the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, and the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof, ye shall \w receive|strong="H6902"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4978"\w* and \w rewards|strong="H5023"\w* and \w great|strong="H7690"\w* \w honour|strong="H3367"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3861"\w* \w shew|strong="H2324"\w* me the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, and the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 2.6 \ft rewards: or, fee\f*

They \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* \w again|strong="H8579"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, Let the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w tell|strong="H0560"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, and we will \w shew|strong="H2324"\w* the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* of it.

The \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w know|strong="H3046"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w certainty|strong="H3330"\w* that \w ye|strong="H0608"\w* would \w gain|strong="H2084"\w* the \w time|strong="H5732"\w*, \w because|strong="H6903"\w* ye \w see|strong="H2370"\w* the \w thing|strong="H4406"\w* is \w gone|strong="H0230"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* me.\f + \fr 2.8 \ft gain: Chaldee, buy\f*

But \w if|strong="H2006"\w* ye will \w not|strong="H3809"\w* make \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto me the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \add there is but\add* \w one|strong="H1932"\w* \w decree|strong="H1882"\w* for you: for ye have \w prepared|strong="H2164"\w* \w lying|strong="H3538"\w* and \w corrupt|strong="H7844"\w* \w words|strong="H4406"\w* to \w speak|strong="H0560"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* me, \w till|strong="H5705"\w* the \w time|strong="H5732"\w* be \w changed|strong="H8133"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3861"\w* \w tell|strong="H0560"\w* me the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, and I shall \w know|strong="H3046"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* ye can \w shew|strong="H2324"\w* me the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof.

¶ The \w Chaldeans|strong="H3779"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, There \w is|strong="H0383"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* a \w man|strong="H0606"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* the \w earth|strong="H3007"\w* that \w can|strong="H3202"\w* \w shew|strong="H2324"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w matter|strong="H4406"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H6903"\w* \add there is\add* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w lord|strong="H7229"\w*, nor \w ruler|strong="H7990"\w*, \add that\add* \w asked|strong="H7593"\w* \w such|strong="H1836"\w* \w things|strong="H4406"\w* at \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w magician|strong="H2749"\w*, or \w astrologer|strong="H0826"\w*, or \w Chaldean|strong="H3779"\w*.

And \add it is\add* a \w rare|strong="H3358"\w* \w thing|strong="H4406"\w* that the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w requireth|strong="H7593"\w*, and there \w is|strong="H0383"\w* \w none|strong="H3809"\w* \w other|strong="H0321"\w* that can \w shew|strong="H2324"\w* it \w before|strong="H6925"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w except|strong="H3861"\w* the \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*, whose \w dwelling|strong="H4070"\w* \w is|strong="H0383"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1321"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6903"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w cause|strong="H3606"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* was \w angry|strong="H1149"\w* and \w very|strong="H7690"\w* \w furious|strong="H7108"\w*, and \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H0007"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \add men\add* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.

And the \w decree|strong="H1882"\w* went \w forth|strong="H5312"\w* that the \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \add men\add* should be \w slain|strong="H6992"\w*; and they \w sought|strong="H1156"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* and his \w fellows|strong="H2269"\w* to be \w slain|strong="H6992"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w answered|strong="H8421"\w* with \w counsel|strong="H5843"\w* and \w wisdom|strong="H2942"\w* to \w Arioch|strong="H0746"\w* the \w captain|strong="H7229"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w guard|strong="H2877"\w*, which was gone \w forth|strong="H5312"\w* to \w slay|strong="H6992"\w* the \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \add men\add* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*:\f + \fr 2.14 \ft answered…: Chaldee, returned\f*\f + \fr 2.14 \ft captain…: or, chief marshal: Chaldee, chief of the executioners, or, slaughtermen\f*

He \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* to \w Arioch|strong="H0746"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w captain|strong="H7990"\w*, \w Why|strong="H4101"\w* \add is\add* the \w decree|strong="H1882"\w* \add so\add* \w hasty|strong="H2685"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*? \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Arioch|strong="H0746"\w* made the \w thing|strong="H4406"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* to \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*.

Then \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* went \w in|strong="H5954"\w*, and \w desired|strong="H1156"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* that he would \w give|strong="H5415"\w* him \w time|strong="H2166"\w*, and that he would \w shew|strong="H2324"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w went|strong="H0236"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, and made the \w thing|strong="H4406"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* to \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, \w Mishael|strong="H4333"\w*, and \w Azariah|strong="H5839"\w*, his \w companions|strong="H2269"\w*:

That they would \w desire|strong="H1156"\w* \w mercies|strong="H7359"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w secret|strong="H7328"\w*; that \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* and his \w fellows|strong="H2269"\w* should \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w perish|strong="H0007"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* the \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \add men\add* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.\f + \fr 2.18 \ft of the God: Chaldee, from before God\f*\f + \fr 2.18 \ft that Daniel…: or, that they should not destroy Daniel, etc\f*

¶ \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* was the \w secret|strong="H7328"\w* \w revealed|strong="H1541"\w* unto \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* in a \w night|strong="H3916"\w* \w vision|strong="H2376"\w*. \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1289"\w* the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*.

\w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1289"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* the \w name|strong="H8036"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w for|strong="H4481"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5705"\w*: for \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* and \w might|strong="H1370"\w* \w are|strong="H1932"\w* his:

And he \w changeth|strong="H8133"\w* the \w times|strong="H5732"\w* and the \w seasons|strong="H2166"\w*: he \w removeth|strong="H5709"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*, and setteth \w up|strong="H6966"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*: he \w giveth|strong="H3052"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* unto the \w wise|strong="H2445"\w*, and \w knowledge|strong="H4486"\w* to them that \w know|strong="H3046"\w* \w understanding|strong="H0999"\w*:

He \w revealeth|strong="H1541"\w* the \w deep|strong="H5994"\w* and secret \w things|strong="H5642"\w*: he \w knoweth|strong="H3046"\w* \w what|strong="H4101"\w* \add is\add* in the \w darkness|strong="H2816"\w*, and the \w light|strong="H5094"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="H8271"\w* with \w him|strong="H5974"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w thank|strong="H3029"\w* thee, and \w praise|strong="H7624"\w* thee, O thou \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of my \w fathers|strong="H0002"\w*, who hast \w given|strong="H3052"\w* me \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* and \w might|strong="H1370"\w*, and hast made \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto me \w now|strong="H3705"\w* what we \w desired|strong="H1156"\w* of \w thee|strong="H4481"\w*: for thou hast \add now\add* made \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto us the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w matter|strong="H4406"\w*.

¶ \w Therefore|strong="H3606"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* went \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w Arioch|strong="H0746"\w*, whom the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* had \w ordained|strong="H4483"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H0007"\w* the \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \add men\add* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*: he \w went|strong="H0236"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w thus|strong="H3652"\w* unto him; \w Destroy|strong="H0007"\w* \w not|strong="H0409"\w* the \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \add men\add* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*: bring me \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, and I will \w shew|strong="H2324"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Arioch|strong="H0746"\w* brought \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* in \w haste|strong="H0927"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w thus|strong="H3652"\w* unto him, I have \w found|strong="H7912"\w* a \w man|strong="H1400"\w* of the \w captives|strong="H1123"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w*, that will make \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.\f + \fr 2.25 \ft I have…: Chaldee, That I have found\f*\f + \fr 2.25 \ft captives…: Chaldee, children of the captivity of Judah\f*

The \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* to \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \add was\add* \w Belteshazzar|strong="H1096"\w*, \w Art|strong="H0383"\w* thou \w able|strong="H3546"\w* to make \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto me the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* which I have \w seen|strong="H2370"\w*, and the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof?

\w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* in the \w presence|strong="H6925"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, The \w secret|strong="H7328"\w* which the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* hath \w demanded|strong="H7593"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3202"\w* the \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \add men\add*, the \w astrologers|strong="H0826"\w*, the \w magicians|strong="H2749"\w*, the \w soothsayers|strong="H1505"\w*, \w shew|strong="H2324"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*;

\w But|strong="H1297"\w* there \w is|strong="H0383"\w* a \w God|strong="H0426"\w* in \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* that \w revealeth|strong="H1541"\w* \w secrets|strong="H7328"\w*, and maketh \w known|strong="H3046"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w what|strong="H4101"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1934"\w* in the \w latter|strong="H0320"\w* \w days|strong="H3118"\w*. Thy \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, and the \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* of thy \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* thy \w bed|strong="H4903"\w*, are \w these|strong="H1836"\w*;\f + \fr 2.28 \ft maketh…: Chaldee, hath made known\f*

As for \w thee|strong="H0607"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, thy \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w* \w came|strong="H5559"\w* \add into thy mind\add* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* thy \w bed|strong="H4903"\w*, \w what|strong="H4101"\w* should come to \w pass|strong="H1934"\w* \w hereafter|strong="H0311"\w*: and he that \w revealeth|strong="H1541"\w* \w secrets|strong="H7328"\w* maketh \w known|strong="H3046"\w* to thee \w what|strong="H4101"\w* shall come to \w pass|strong="H1934"\w*.\f + \fr 2.29 \ft came: Chaldee, came up\f*

But as for \w me|strong="H0576"\w*, \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w secret|strong="H7328"\w* is \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w revealed|strong="H1541"\w* to me for \add any\add* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* that I \w have|strong="H0383"\w* more \w than|strong="H4481"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w living|strong="H2417"\w*, \w but|strong="H3861"\w* for \add their\add* \w sakes|strong="H1701"\w* \w that|strong="H5922"\w* shall make \w known|strong="H3046"\w* the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, and that thou mightest \w know|strong="H3046"\w* the \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w* of thy \w heart|strong="H3825"\w*.\f + \fr 2.30 \ft but for…: or, but for the intent that the interpretation may be made known to the king\f*

¶ \w Thou|strong="H0607"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w sawest|strong="H1934"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H0431"\w* a \w great|strong="H2298"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w*. \w This|strong="H1797"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w*, whose \w brightness|strong="H2122"\w* \add was\add* \w excellent|strong="H3493"\w*, \w stood|strong="H6966"\w* \w before|strong="H6903"\w* thee; and the \w form|strong="H7299"\w* thereof \add was\add* \w terrible|strong="H1763"\w*.\f + \fr 2.31 \ft sawest: Chaldee, wast seeing\f*

This \w image’s|strong="H6755"\w* \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \add was\add* of \w fine|strong="H2869"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*, his \w breast|strong="H2306"\w* and his \w arms|strong="H1872"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3702"\w*, his \w belly|strong="H4577"\w* and his \w thighs|strong="H3410"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5174"\w*,\f + \fr 2.32 \ft thighs: or, sides\f*

His \w legs|strong="H8243"\w* of \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*, his \w feet|strong="H7271"\w* \w part|strong="H4481"\w* of \w iron|strong="H6523"\w* and \w part|strong="H4481"\w* of \w clay|strong="H2635"\w*.

Thou \w sawest|strong="H2370"\w* \w till|strong="H5705"\w* that a \w stone|strong="H0069"\w* was cut \w out|strong="H1505"\w* \w without|strong="H3809"\w* \w hands|strong="H3028"\w*, which \w smote|strong="H4223"\w* the \w image|strong="H6755"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* his \w feet|strong="H7271"\w* \add that were\add* of \w iron|strong="H6523"\w* and \w clay|strong="H2635"\w*, and \w brake|strong="H1855"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* to \w pieces|strong="H1855"\w*.\f + \fr 2.34 \ft without…: or, which was not in hands\f*

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* was the \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*, the \w clay|strong="H2635"\w*, the \w brass|strong="H5174"\w*, the \w silver|strong="H3702"\w*, and the \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*, broken to \w pieces|strong="H1855"\w* \w together|strong="H2298"\w*, and \w became|strong="H1934"\w* like the \w chaff|strong="H5784"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w summer|strong="H7007"\w* \w threshingfloors|strong="H0147"\w*; and the \w wind|strong="H7308"\w* \w carried|strong="H5376"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* \w away|strong="H5376"\w*, \w that|strong="H3606"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w place|strong="H0870"\w* was \w found|strong="H7912"\w* for them: and the \w stone|strong="H0069"\w* that \w smote|strong="H4223"\w* the \w image|strong="H6755"\w* \w became|strong="H1934"\w* a \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2906"\w*, and \w filled|strong="H4391"\w* the \w whole|strong="H3606"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*.

¶ \w This|strong="H1836"\w* \add is\add* the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*; and we will \w tell|strong="H0560"\w* the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof \w before|strong="H6925"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H0607"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \add art\add* a \w king|strong="H4430"\w* of \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*: for the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* hath \w given|strong="H3052"\w* thee a \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, \w power|strong="H2632"\w*, and \w strength|strong="H8632"\w*, and \w glory|strong="H3367"\w*.

And \w wheresoever|strong="H3606"\w* the \w children|strong="H1123"\w* of \w men|strong="H0606"\w* \w dwell|strong="H1753"\w*, the \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* of the \w field|strong="H1251"\w* and the \w fowls|strong="H5776"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* hath he \w given|strong="H3052"\w* into thine \w hand|strong="H3028"\w*, and hath made thee \w ruler|strong="H7981"\w* over them \w all|strong="H3606"\w*. \w Thou|strong="H0607"\w* \add art\add* this \w head|strong="H7217"\w* of \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*.

And \w after|strong="H0870"\w* thee shall \w arise|strong="H6966"\w* \w another|strong="H0317"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w inferior|strong="H0772"\w* to \w thee|strong="H4481"\w*, and \w another|strong="H0317"\w* \w third|strong="H8523"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5174"\w*, which shall bear \w rule|strong="H7981"\w* over \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*.

And the \w fourth|strong="H7244"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w strong|strong="H8624"\w* as \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*: forasmuch as \w iron|strong="H6523"\w* breaketh in \w pieces|strong="H1855"\w* and \w subdueth|strong="H2827"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \add things:\add* and \w as|strong="H6903"\w* \w iron|strong="H6523"\w* that \w breaketh|strong="H7490"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w these|strong="H0459"\w*, shall it break in \w pieces|strong="H1855"\w* and \w bruise|strong="H7490"\w*.

And whereas thou \w sawest|strong="H2370"\w* the \w feet|strong="H7271"\w* and \w toes|strong="H0677"\w*, \w part|strong="H4481"\w* of \w potters’|strong="H6353"\w* \w clay|strong="H2635"\w*, and \w part|strong="H4481"\w* of \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*, the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w divided|strong="H6386"\w*; \w but|strong="H4481"\w* there shall \w be|strong="H1934"\w* in it \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w strength|strong="H5326"\w* of the \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*, forasmuch \w as|strong="H3606"\w* thou \w sawest|strong="H2370"\w* the \w iron|strong="H6523"\w* \w mixed|strong="H6151"\w* with \w miry|strong="H2917"\w* \w clay|strong="H2635"\w*.

And \add as\add* the \w toes|strong="H0677"\w* of the \w feet|strong="H7271"\w* \add were\add* \w part|strong="H4481"\w* of \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*, and \w part|strong="H4481"\w* of \w clay|strong="H2635"\w*, \add so\add* the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w partly|strong="H4481"\w* \w strong|strong="H8624"\w*, and \w partly|strong="H4481"\w* \w broken|strong="H8406"\w*.\f + \fr 2.42 \ft broken: or, brittle\f*

And \w whereas|strong="H1768"\w* thou \w sawest|strong="H2370"\w* \w iron|strong="H6523"\w* \w mixed|strong="H6151"\w* with \w miry|strong="H2917"\w* \w clay|strong="H2635"\w*, they shall mingle \w themselves|strong="H1934"\w* with the \w seed|strong="H2234"\w* of \w men|strong="H0606"\w*: but they \w shall|strong="H1934"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w cleave|strong="H1693"\w* \w one|strong="H1836"\w* \w to|strong="H5974"\w* \w another|strong="H1836"\w*, \w even|strong="H1888"\w* as \w iron|strong="H6523"\w* is \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w mixed|strong="H6151"\w* with \w clay|strong="H2635"\w*.\f + \fr 2.43 \ft one…: Chaldee, this with this\f*

And in the \w days|strong="H3118"\w* of \w these|strong="H0581"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* shall the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* set \w up|strong="H6966"\w* a \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, which shall \w never|strong="H5957"\w* be \w destroyed|strong="H2255"\w*: and the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* shall \w not|strong="H3809"\w* be \w left|strong="H7662"\w* to \w other|strong="H0321"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w*, \add but\add* it shall break in \w pieces|strong="H1855"\w* and \w consume|strong="H5487"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w these|strong="H0459"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4437"\w*, and \w it|strong="H1932"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H6966"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*.\f + \fr 2.44 \ft the days: Chaldee, their days\f*\f + \fr 2.44 \ft the kingdom: Chaldee, the kingdom thereof\f*

Forasmuch \w as|strong="H3606"\w* thou \w sawest|strong="H2370"\w* that the \w stone|strong="H0069"\w* was cut \w out|strong="H1505"\w* of the \w mountain|strong="H2906"\w* \w without|strong="H3809"\w* \w hands|strong="H3028"\w*, and that it brake in \w pieces|strong="H1855"\w* the \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*, the \w brass|strong="H5174"\w*, the \w clay|strong="H2635"\w*, the \w silver|strong="H3702"\w*, and the \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*; the \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* hath made \w known|strong="H3046"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w what|strong="H4101"\w* shall come to \w pass|strong="H1934"\w* \w hereafter|strong="H0311"\w*: and the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \add is\add* \w certain|strong="H3330"\w*, and the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof \w sure|strong="H0540"\w*.\f + \fr 2.45 \ft without…: or, which was not in hands\f*\f + \fr 2.45 \ft hereafter: Chaldee, after this\f*

¶ \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w fell|strong="H5308"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* his \w face|strong="H0600"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H5457"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, and \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w* that they should \w offer|strong="H5260"\w* an \w oblation|strong="H4504"\w* and sweet \w odours|strong="H5208"\w* unto him.

The \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* unto \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, \w Of|strong="H4481"\w* a \w truth|strong="H7187"\w* \add it is\add*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* your \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \add is\add* a \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*, and a \w Lord|strong="H4756"\w* of \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*, and a \w revealer|strong="H1541"\w* of \w secrets|strong="H7328"\w*, seeing thou \w couldest|strong="H3202"\w* \w reveal|strong="H1541"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w secret|strong="H7328"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H7236"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* a great \w man|strong="H7236"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* him \w many|strong="H7690"\w* \w great|strong="H7260"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4978"\w*, and made him \w ruler|strong="H7981"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* the \w whole|strong="H3606"\w* \w province|strong="H4083"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, and \w chief|strong="H7229"\w* of the \w governors|strong="H5460"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \add men\add* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.

Then \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w requested|strong="H1156"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, and he \w set|strong="H4483"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, and \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*, \w over|strong="H5922"\w* the \w affairs|strong="H5673"\w* of the \w province|strong="H4083"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*: but \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \add sat\add* in the \w gate|strong="H8651"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.
